Description: Massive steatite cylinder seal, with traces of dark blue-green glaze, ridged suspension loop at one end, exterior inscribed with three lateral registers of hieroglyphs containing cartouches and epithets.
Bibliographic references: Monaco 2008 / Queens of Egypt: from Hetepheres to Cleopatra
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2008 Jul-Sep, Monaco, Grimaldi Forum, Reines de Egyptes
